When pesto is life. I usually always make pesto when I have a lot of greens on hand. It‚Äôs fun to add other ingredients like kale & arugula for extra flavor and nutrients. This one specifically includes kale. Nothing is exactly measured because I like to do things by eye üòÇ
1 handful of kale
1 handful of basil
1/4 cup hemp seeds 
1/4 cup nutritional yeast 
1 clove of garlic
Salt & pepper
Combine everything in a food processor or high speed blender (I used my @vitamix) and gradually add extra virgin avocado oil (olive oil works too) - I hope that you guys are having a great Thursday. Can‚Äôt wait for the weekend üòçüòçüòç
